title: 7.4.3 Create findings summary aggregation
body:
## Parent Issue
#32 - 7.4 Findings Management System

## Objective
Implement summary aggregation for dashboard display.

## Summary Data
- Total findings count
- Open findings count
- Breakdown by severity
- Breakdown by resource type
- Breakdown by status

## Files to Create
- `src/cloud_optimizer/services/findings.py` (get_summary method)

## Estimated Time: 2 hours
